original_text: And I will scatter toward every wind all that are about him to help him, and all his bands; and I will draw out the sword after them.
korean_text: 내가 그 호위하는 자와 부대들을 다 사방으로 흩고 또 그 뒤를 따라 칼을 빼리라

sentences.original_text: And I will scatter toward every wind
all that are about him to help him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 돕는 그의 모든 주변 사람들을

sentences.original_text: and I will draw out the sword after them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그들 뒤에 칼을 뽑으리라
